aboutUsSection.title: ABOUT US
aboutUsSection.subtitle: A few words about our company

USPV.subtitle: WE ARE
USPV.title: USPV
USPV.description1: The USPV group of companies, operating in the photovoltaic industry and other areas of renewable energy, has been well-established in both the Czech and international markets for a long time. It is owned by Czech entrepreneur Tomáš Korostenský.
USPV.description2: In addition to photovoltaic power plants (FVE), the USPV group also owns a portfolio of connection points to FVE, to which it plans to connect further production facilities across the Czech Republic in the near future. The USPV group focuses on locations where FVE construction, in accordance with new legislation, can support the energy self-sufficiency of the Czech Republic and the independence of municipalities, enabling greater control and flexibility in energy policy for municipalities.

Ekotechnik.subtitle: IN PARTNERSHIP WITH
Ekotechnik.title: Ekotechnik Czech
Ekotechnik.description: Ekotechnik Czech s.r.o.. has been active in the Czech market since 1990 and specializes in the design, construction, and operation of solar power plants. It offers comprehensive services from the initial project design, obtaining all necessary permits, to the implementation and maintenance of photovoltaic systems. Thanks to its long-standing experience, it can tailor solutions that meet the specific needs of municipalities and smaller towns. It emphasizes energy needs analysis, providing comprehensive energy services for maximum benefits in the form of savings, quick service, and exceptional customer care. Ekotechnik Czech s.r.o. also offers environmentally friendly solutions.

SolarKit.subtitle: AND
SolarKit.title: Solar Kit
SolarKit.description: Solar Kit Hungary is a dynamic company based in Budapest, specializing in the wholesale distribution of photovoltaic (PV) systems. Founded in 2016, it quickly expanded not only in Hungary but also to other European countries. It offers comprehensive solar solutions and PV product distribution for residential, commercial, and industrial purposes. Through partnerships with brands such as Huawei, Deye, and SolaX, it offers competitive prices and high quality. The company prides itself on technical support, partner training, extensive warehousing, and efficient logistics. With an annual turnover exceeding 17 million EUR and over 4,000 installed systems, it is one of the significant players in the solar industry.

card1.title: Building a Leading Solar Portfolio in the Czech Republic
card1.text: Company has focused to develop significant portfolio of solar power plants in the Czech Republic to reflect the high demand for renewable energy as well as to respond to the energy market development.

card2.title: Group Currently Owns and Operates PV of 33MWp
card2.text: In the Czech Republic, a total of 7 MWp was developed, followed by 6 MWp in Romania. Additionally, a 20 MWp project, financed by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), was completed in Ukraine.

card3.title: Years Proven Track Record
card3.text: With over 1.2 GWp in solar power plant projects developed across multiple countries, the company has established a strong presence in the global renewable energy market.
